generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian paths or walkways on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Buildings are visible on the left side of the road, including residential and commercial structures.
- fence: A fence is visible along the right side of the road, separating the road from a green area.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including streetlights and possibly traffic signal poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil areas are visible along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car in front and parked cars on the left side.
- bus: A red bus is visible on the right side of the road, and another bus is visible further ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the road, following the black car.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person riding a bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
